module.description: Register fields should be considered static unless otherwise noted as dynamic.

bitfield.description: Software should not rely on the value of a reserved bit. To provide compatibility with future products, the value of a reserved bit should be preserved across a read-modify-write operation.
Set to 1 to connect the temperature sensor to the SOC_ADC. See also RFCORE_XREG_ATEST register description to enable the temperature sensor.
Software should not rely on the value of a reserved bit. To provide compatibility with future products, the value of a reserved bit should be preserved across a read-modify-write operation.
